name: Can Pirates Do That?
description:
FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED FOR THIS

HOW TO PLAY:

E - Enter door. Inside a level, doors only open with a certain amount of keys, that you can acquire killing enemies using your bomb.

A and D - Move your character.

Space - Jump

R - Rewind the time of your bomb.

Left Shift - Throw bomb. There can be only one bomb at a single time.

Esc - Go back to the menu.

GAME STARTS ALREADY AT THE MENU. YOU HAVE FULL CONTROL OF YOUR CHARACTER. JUST PICK A DOOR TO ENTER. 

If you are stuck in a level don't be afraid of skiping it and trying again later. Some levels have multiple solutions, while others only one.  There are 12 levels in total. 

Comment bellow your opinion about this game and its puzzles. I'll try to respond everyone of them :)
